attacks.name: V-create
attacks.text: If you have 4 or fewer Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Double Fire
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Double Freeze
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. If either of them is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Perplex
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dizzy Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Core Cannon
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Fighting Energy attached to this Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Trickle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Energy Press

attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: X-Scissor

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Mysterious Evolution
attacks.text: If Karrablast is in play, search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Acid Spray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

attacks.name: Double Draw
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Leaf Wallop
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Leaf Wallop attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Victory Star
ability.text: Once during your turn, after you flip any coins for an attack, you may ignore all effects of those coin flips and begin flipping those coins again. You can't use more than 1 Victory Star Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Stored Power
attacks.text: Move all Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.text: Does 30 damage times the number of your Pokémon that have the Round attack.

ability.text: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

cards.name: Cover Fossil
text: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Tirtouga you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Eviolite
text: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is a Basic Pokémon, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.

cards.name: Plume Fossil
text: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Archen you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
